maqras.text: He frowned and turned away
That the blind man came to him
And what do you know? He might reform [to become a righteous man]
Or, he might deliberate and the deliberation might benefit him
Now he who is well-to-do
To him you pay attention
And [even when] it is not your responsibility if he would not reform
And he who comes to you in earnest
And fears (Allah)
By him then are you distracted
No! [Your resentment at the blind man's intrusion is not right.] This [Qur'aan] is only an open source of divine Admonition to recite
So whoso wills may recite it and take heed from
In records honourable
Exalted and purified
By hands of scribes
Noble and virtuous
Man be damned, how ungrateful is he
Out of what thing did He create him
HE created him out of fertilized ovum and then moulded him in due proportion
And then made the path of life convenient for him
And then He caused him to die and consigned him to dust
And then, whenever He wishes, He will raise him back to life
No! Man did certainly not carry out what Allah had asked him to do
Let man just look at his food
[To enable man to get his food] We poured water [rain] in showers
And We pierced the soil, so that it got soaked [with rain water]
Then We caused grain to grow therein
And grapevines and vegetables
And olive-trees and palm-trees
And luxuriant orchards
And fruits and fodder
As provision for you and your cattle
Then as the deafening blast occurs
On the Day when every man would flee from his brother
And his mother and his father
And his spouse and his children
On that Day everyone among them will be preoccupied with his own individual concerns
Faces that Day would be beaming
Cheerful and joyous
Faces that Day would be gloomy
Darkness covering them
Those would be the ones suppressing the Truth, the ones wicked
When the sun is folded up
And when the stars lose their lustre
And when the mountains are moved
And when the ten-months pregnant camels are abandoned
And when the wild beasts are gathered
And when the seas overflow
And when the souls are rejoined (with their bodies)
And when the girl-child buried alive shall be asked
For what sin was she killed
And when the scrolls [of human deeds] are laid open
And when the sky is stripped off
And the Hell stoked
And the Paradise brought near
Every person comes to know what he has brought along
No! [The misgivings of the people that do not believe in these revelations are not correct, and] I swear by the stars
That retreat and hide
And by the night as it moves
And the morning as it breathes
This is indeed the word of a noble [Angel] Messenger
A mighty One with the Lord of the Throne
One to be obeyed besides being trustworthy
And your companion [Prophet Muhammad] is not mad
And he did certainly see the Angel Messenger on the clear horizon
And he [Prophet] does not grudge (conveying what has been revealed to him) of the Unseen
And it is not a word of accursed Satan
Where then are you going
This is nothing but Good Counsel for the worlds
For any of you who wishes to follow the Straight Way
And you wish not unless Allah, the Lord of the Universe, so wishes
